titleStmt.title: A letter to Dr. Burnet from the Right Honourable the Earl of Rochester, as he lay on his death-bed, at His Honours lodge in Woodstock-Park / printed from the original, wrote with his own hand, June 25, 1680, at twelve at night.
titleStmt.author: Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
